Reviews.Title: Extremely happy with this TV!
Reviews.Author: USN2EE
Reviews.Content: This TV is immaculate! I was worried about the very few and negative reviews so I looked the TV up on walmart and it had 230 reviews with a 4.5....And it shows! Perfect picture, great sound, everything...Extremely happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: An excellent choice!
Reviews.Author: Donald A. Shinn
Reviews.Content: I opted to go for a lower priced HDTV for my bedroom and this one quickly moved to the top of the list. I've had it for a few days now and it's everything I wanted and more. I have a one year old Samsung HDTV (their 530 series) and this HDTV is every bit its equal in terms of picture quality. Hi-def images are amazing and regular definition is also displayed very well. I have absolutely no complaints about this HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Going strong after 1.5 years...
Reviews.Author: ReaderChick
Reviews.Content: We paid $500 for this TV a year and a half ago, and it's going strong.  Good value, great picture, remote works great.  It's perfect, except for one thing: the volume.We have lived in three homes since we bought it (attempting to account for acoustics or distance from the TV to the couch here), and there is a problem with 13/14 volume.  On 13, you can barely hear the volume, and on 14, it's screaming at you.  Needless to say, we spend a lot of time toggling between the two volumes trying to get it right.Outside of the volume issue, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: 42" TV
Reviews.Author: mary Ann Cooper
Reviews.Content: Everything to order this was easy and just as they promised. I love the size and the really sharp picture.

Reviews.Title: 70% crap TV. Suggestion - DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Tochpad Buyer
Reviews.Content: I am writing this review after keeping the crap TV for 1 year and then finally decided to sell it in craigslist.TV started showing picture problems right after 3 months into purchase. Was very annoyed but RCA did send someone to fix it being in 1 year warranty period. The fixing guys came and declared within no time that it is PCB problem. They ordered it from SEARS and went back.Meanwhile I discovered when I tap very hard on back of TV, colors became OK. But they might go bad anytime and I have to repeat the process.After two months part arrived and the fixing guys came back and replaced it. Just one more months into it TV started giving exactly same problem and then RCA would not fix it.

Reviews.Title: WORST TV EVER
Reviews.Author: Stanley
Reviews.Content: Bought this for $499.99 from BestBuy. About 80 days after I bought there was bar/vertical stripe on the left side . Video wasn't that great to start out with. Unfortunally I didnt purchase the geek squad warrenty with bestbuy (dumb me) and thank goodness it had a 1 year manufracturer warrenty. But its ridiculous to deal with the manufacturer. After like 2 months dealing with them, I got tired and bought a new one from best buy and took the other one back and got a refund. And now the brand new out the box not even a month theres a line that wants to pop thru. I WIll NOT and emphisise NOT be buying any more RCA products. A TV should not break after 3 months. That's why they sell it cheaper. Hope this helps your choice.

Reviews.Title: Lines of dead pixels after 6 months
Reviews.Author: Gift Card Recipient "Slap Happy North"
Reviews.Content: Seriously, how does a company stay in business when its products cannot hold out for six months? I bought this unit on sale despite the large number of reviews mentioning defects.  Should have heeded the warnings.  Less than six months later, I am trying to schedule a service call.  Naturally, service is only available a couple of weekdays out of the week, and no drop-off is available.  So, if you happen to have a, whaddayacallit, JOB, this is decidedly difficult to work out.  Will never buy from RCA again, don't understand why anyone would give the manufacturer a second chance.

Reviews.Title: RCA 42LA45RQ 42-Inch 1080p LCD TV - Black
Reviews.Author: __Spider
Reviews.Content: I love my TV it came as was said in the description , the color is nice , picture quality is awesome , and the sound is GREAT ! I would RECOMMEND to anybody to purchase at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Wounderful deal!
Reviews.Author: Aðalsteinn
Reviews.Content: I was so happy to buy a new flat panel tv and to only pay $399 for it was great. The HD is so sharp and the color is stunning the reason i got it was it was the 1080p

Reviews.Title: excellent value
Reviews.Author: Salvatore J Pelonero
Reviews.Content: I bought this television to replace the main one in the living room. The picture quality is excellent and the price was less than I had expected for this size TV.

Reviews.Title: Bad Choice
Reviews.Author: J. Syverson "Viking Cruiser"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for $469 from Walmart. No video after 85 days. Video wasn't that great to start out with. Glad Wally World has a 90 day return policy. They took it back after 85 days with no box. Purchased an LG 42" for $100 more. I already have an LG and for 2 years its been a great TV. WIll not be buying any more RCA products. A TV should not break after 3 months. That's why they sell it cheaper. Hope this helps your choice.

Reviews.Title: This is a great tv.
Reviews.Author: Kurt Carlton
Reviews.Content: I dont know why there are so many bad reviews. I have a 46" tv like this one and this one and they both are great tvs. My girlfriend loves her 46". Netflix, direct tv, dvds, and apple tv all look great on the 46". I decided to buy the 46" because of the price and it was the best thing we ever did. I now am buying the 42" for another room in our house. I have used the 42" a few times and wow it is great. RCA isn't LG or Sony if you try to hold it up to those then you will for sure be sad. It is a TV, if it looks good and has sound then don't sit there are wish you had an LG or Sony. I would buy more of these tvs because they are great and i got it for only 388 so that is a steal in itself.What is this about the picture speed is to slow. I would check to see if you have cable or satellite because this tv has just as great picture speed as any other so it is probably your cable/satellite box or old dvd player. thanks amazon for a great tv at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: derymax
Reviews.Content: Great product, i like it and the seller was quick to ship the product. I would recommend this item to for anybody who wants to buy a 42' TV

Reviews.Title: Works so far!
Reviews.Author: Aaron Rogers
Reviews.Content: So far the TV works great, puts out a lot of heat, but that is to be expected. If you don't have HD tv,you notice the lack of quality but it isn't because of the TV. It works AWESOME with XBOX and Playstation. Has some alignment issues when used as a computer display.

Reviews.Title: If you're happy with this tv, you won't be for very long.
Reviews.Author: T Hylkema
Reviews.Content: After reading the mixed reviews on how this was either a great tv for the price or how the picture and sound went out within a few weeks I bought the tv anyway hoping that my tv wouldn't be one of the defective ones.I was very happy with it at first, the picture was good and the sound was ok (we supplemented with a stereo system). The only issue was that one of the HDMI ports was loose, but the others worked fine.I've had the tv for 5 months and one day the picture started fading out beginning on the left and worked its way across the screen within 5 minutes. Luckily I bought a one year warranty from the store in light of the reviews I had seen.I am obviously not happy with this product anymore. If you're the type of person who updates their gadgets every few months anyway, go for it (and buy the warranty while you're at it). But if you're like me and expect a tv to last a few years, look for something else.

Reviews.Title: RCA TV 42"
Reviews.Author: Travel
Reviews.Content: Great TV, very good deal, functining very well like any other high brand name tv.good size, weight, picture quality and sound.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable HDTV !! Not to mention the great Price !!
Reviews.Author: TJ "Mount Man"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a gift. Everything about this TV is beyond my expectations. Very happy with this purchase. The gift recipient and her family love this TV!!  They continue to thank me everytime I see them. There were no problem's with the hook up. Picture and sound is wonderful ! Anyone looking for a 42" LCD... this one was an exceptionally great purchase and a great price!  RCA rocks once again !!

Reviews.Title: Good TV til something goes wrong!!
Reviews.Author: P. Murray
Reviews.Content: This TV was pretty good for awhile. Then the main board went - a couple of days after the wararanty period. Was told they have been having a problem with this particular TV and was told to call customer service. They basically said - sorry! We can send a service man for a price of $100 plus an additional $200 plus for parts - even tho they knew this TV was defective!!! I will never buy another RCA product!!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: Goindia
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from Sears for $399+ tax and I thought that it was a great deal. I did look at the reviews by others,especially the negative ones, but chose to ignore them in view of the money saved. BIG MISTAKE! To begin with, it took about 5 weeks to get this TV because it was on back order. The TV worked exactly 30 days; the video faded out as we were watching and the sound faded out a little bit later. I talked to Sears Repair service. Three days later, they sent a service guy to repair at home (which is nice). The service guy said that two boards were defective and he ordered the parts. He made an appointment to come back the following week. Then I get a message from Sears saying that the parts are on back order and I may have to wait another 2-3 weeks. I am fed up with the quality of this TV and Sears. In my 40 years of TV buying (14 TVs), I never had a TV conk out on me before 3 years. I am going to Sears to talk to the manager and return the TV. This is a major hassle because of the time,aggravation,and physical strain of returning the TV. My suggestion to the potential buyers is-not to make my mistake. If you buy this make and model of  TV, you are taking a chance because there appears to be no quality control. You may be lucky and get a good one or you may be like me.

Reviews.Title: If your RCA 42LA45RQ goes dark and only flashes once at startup...
Reviews.Author: Borislav Kolev
Reviews.Content: This TV, while having a very nice display and overall good functionality, is known to have a few glitches that only develop over time.In all fairness this is also true for most other products on the market.The 42LA45RQ is known to develop a problem where the screen would remain dark even though the TV comes and works fine meaning it is actually able to opearte and it outputs sound (if switched to appropriate input/channel), but of course you can't see anything since the display is dark.It may flash once during initial powering on and you may hear a bit of a buzzing sound, but that is not always the case.Coppell TV Repair has more details and ,hopefully, resolution to the problem that may have brought you here:[...]

Reviews.Title: Just OK, nothing special
Reviews.Author: maryld123
Reviews.Content: This was my first purchase of a flat screen and after talking with a sales person at my local store he told me about this TV because I didn't want to spend over 500.00.  I didn't expect it to be the best TV but I was pretty bummed when after the first day I noticed the picture speed is terrible.  I was watching a TV program and it was blury when the people were doing something fast.  I also notice some small squares everywhere once and awhile.  Guess I should have spent extra money and got a different brand.

Reviews.Title: broke and sears wont fix
Reviews.Author: Jerry Humphrey "loki1950"
Reviews.Content: I made the mistake of buying from sears.  I thought if it broke then it would be easier to get fixed, than if i bought from amazon.  boy was I wrong.  Broke after 3 weeks, no sound no picture.  It is now 16 days later and Sears finally sent a tech out (3rd party, not sears employee) and they of course had to order a part.  I live near one of the largest cities in USA and they had to order a part taking 5 buiness days at least.  Never, never, never will i buy another RCA anything, nor will I ever buy anything from sears.

ProductInfo.Features:
42-inch LCD HDTV with Full HD 1080p resolution, 16:9 aspect ratio
2 x 8W speakers, seven-band EQ, virtual surround sound mode
4000:1 dynamic contrast ratio; 500 nit brightness; 6.5 ms response time
Four HDMI ports for your high-def sources; VGA input for use as computer monitor
RoHs compliant; meets ENERGY STAR standards
4 HDMI input
Component, VGA, AV input
Resolution: 1920 x 1080, Contrast: 4000:1, Brightness: 500cd/
Response Time: 6.5ms, Digital 3D Comb Filter
Tuner Mode: ATSC
ProductInfo.Name: RCA 42LA45RQ 42-Inch 1080p LCD TV (Black)
